fsrtool.name: fsrtool_snow_jobs
fsrtool.structure: CREATE TABLE `fsrtool_snow_jobs` ( `charID` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `pos` tinyint(4) NOT NULL, `exempt` tinyint(4) NOT NULL, `legacy` tinyint(4) NOT NULL, `probation` tinyint(4) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`charID`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
